channel.title: ~ ChronicFire ~
channel.description:
[URL=http://"http://chronicrsps.com"]Home[/URL] [URL=http://"http://chronicrsps.com/forums"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://chronicrsps.com/playnow"]Webclient[/URL] [URL=http://"http://dl.dropbox.com/u/103471050/Client.jar"]Download Client[/URL]
Welcome to the world of ChronicFire. One half of a dynamic partnership that's shaking up the Runescape Private Server world. ChronicFire and ChronicExile are both Economy servers but the similarities end there, we're both on the same forums creating a friendly rivalry over updates and economys that has turned into one of the most productive partnerships of all time. There are constant events and other fun activities all the time. If you still aren't convinced have a look at some of our features and decide for yourself.
[CENTER][B][U][COLOR="Purple"]Features[/COLOR][/U][/B]
[COLOR="Lime"]Qbd Webclient Fight Kiln Fight caves (Jad) Ipboard forums Vps Hosted DDos protection with 9 alternate Ip adresses 24/7/365 Uptime Facebook, Youtube, and Twitter feeds for constant updates Friendly and highly professional staff Great Community Perfect Pking All skills working Amazing Graphics No lag Bork Kalphite Queen Polypore Dungeon Jadkindo Dungeon Glacors Castlewars Dominion Tower And so so much more[/COLOR][/CENTER]
Media [spoiler] [IMG]http://www.runelocus.com/images/server_uploads/20495_22349.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.runelocus.com/images/server_uploads/20495_22347.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.runelocus.com/images/server_uploads/20495_22348.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.runelocus.com/images/server_uploads/20495_22350.png[/img][spoiler]
What are you waiting for? come join us now!

Welcome to the world of ChronicFire. One half of a dynamic partnership that’s shaking up the Runescape Private Server world. ChronicFire and ChronicExile are both Economy servers but the similarities end there, we’re both on the same forums creating a friendly rivalry over updates and economys that has turned into one of the most productive partnerships of all time.
